feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING ENDED, Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:55 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 10:28 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.5°C
Wind: SW 26 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. A few local snow squalls early this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 09:11 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 09:11 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 09:11 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 09:11 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
